price: Waɗanda suke tsayar da salla, kuma daga abin da Muka azũrtã su sunã ciyarwa.*
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ
footnotes: * Watau sunã yin ibãda ta jiki da ta dũkiya wãjiba da nãfila.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuqīmūna al-ṣalata wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
